metadata.name: Mental peace
metadata.description:
Away! Beyond Right doing and Wrong doing there is a Huge field, I will meet you there.

There will be no jealousy, No hatred, No restrictions, No time boundations, No orthodox Society and No fight. 
Only love will be the language and we will cherish every small moment like sunset, waterfall noise, Birds chirping, Mountains, Trees, Soil etc. 

Happiness is inside us and we always search it outside. Meditate and see how different world is living in your body. 

Cherish you are alive my friend.
